steps.text: Combine flour and salt in a food processor, pulse 2-3 times
Add the lard to the processor in 4-5 chunks, pulse 10-15 times, until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Add water in steady stream as processor is running, until a ball of dough begins to form, about 30 seconds
Remove dough and knead on a lightly floured surface until well-incorporated and less sticky, 2-3 minutes
Wrap in plastic and allow to sit for 1 hour at room temperature
Divide dough into 8 even balls, keep covered with a tea towel
Flatten each ball into a 7 inch disk with a rolling pin
Cook tortillas until light and golden, about 4 minutes per side
Can be held up to 2 hours at room temperature wrapped in a barely damp tea towel
